content: this unisex hat is ideal for cold and windy days knit with one hank of woolstok north choose simple and stylish or add some fun with earflaps and a big pom experience level * advanced beginner materials * woolstok north super bulky 100% fine highland wool 150g/107yds 1 hank * stitch marker * tapestry needle * pom maker optional finished measurements * circumference 20 * height 8 not including earflaps color shown * highland fleece no 4303 with earflaps * deep velvet no 4314 without earflaps
